q.para: Q: Can I bring my dog?

a.para: A: Top of the Rock only allows Seeing Eye/assistance dogs.
A: Strollers are allowed as long as they can fold up in order for maximum capacity.

q.para: Q: Can I bring tripods? What about video cameras?

a.para: A: We do not allow tripods, monopods or video cameras on the observation deck. To set up a professional photo shoot or media taping on the Observation Deck, please email info@topoftherocknyc.com to discuss location fees and/or other arrangements.

q.para: Q: Can I bring food and/beverage to Top of the Rock?

a.para: A: We do not allow food or drinks on the observation decks.

q.para: Q. I am proposing to my significant other/getting married soon, what arrangements can be made for that?

a.para: A. Thank you for considering making Top of the Rock a part of such a personal and romantic experience. We've had many proposals on the Deck since opening, and we always love hearing about more. That said, while we wish you the best of luck, we have yet to organize special arrangements for proposals. If you are interested in planning a Special Event, you are welcome to contact our Special Event Sales Team at 212-698-2000 for details.
